name: Level Size
description: A mod that shows local and saved level sizes.

show-size.name: Show Level Size
show-size.description: Whether or not to show the size of a level.

show-total-size.name: Show Total Size
show-total-size.description: Whether or not to show the total size of the levels on the current page.

show-overall-size.name: Show Overall Size
show-overall-size.description: Whether or not to show the overall size of all levels in the current folder.

white-size.name: White Size
white-size.description: Whether or not to show the size of a saved level in white.
